"It'll be a cold day in a hot place before some automated defense 
system stops a Rogue," Devilcat says confidently.  "But just in 
case ..."  He transforms as well, making sure his own energy shield 
is ready to go up at a picosecond's notice.  Then he moves forward, 
walking at a steady pace to show he is not hostile.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
<wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Got it. In just a few nanocycles, we'll enter the range 
of
> their sensors. If they're on full alert, their defenses can go on. 
Be
> ready just in case.
> 
> He transforms and takes his shield out.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "Odds are we'll be splitting the talking, but I'd suggest you 
> > introduce us."  In his mind, Devilcat runs through possible 
scenarios 
> > for what could happen once they're inside.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil looked and focused. Although the base was a bit far, 
it 
> > was
> > > nothing for robots of their kind.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: That seems to be a pursuit ship. It might have been 
sent
> > > after the preds originally. That's the one. So, you want me or 
you 
> > to
> > > do the talking?
